website_summaries.verdict: No frills. Very durable, super affordable, and highly efficient.
pros: A sturdy design gives this pitcher lasting power and a tight fitting lid allows users to shake it without any spillage
The unique shaking ability allows for a speedier infusion process
cons: Its size makes it too tall for some refrigerator shelves and the tight lid is sometimes hard to remove

customer_reviews.title: Has got us excited about drinking more water
customer_reviews.text: I need to drink more water, but I get tired of plain, cold water. The kids are out for summer, so I thought this would be a great opportunity to try infused water; hopefully it will get us excited about water! It has! I love it. We have put fresh watermelon in it, and we have used frozen peaches, and both have been delicious. It adds just a hint of flavor to the water, which is exactly what I wanted. Will prob be getting this as gifts too!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Henson

customer_reviews.title: Works Ok
customer_reviews.text: The infuser works fine, but I have several gripes with it. The biggest is that if you get called away and leave something strong flavored in the pitcher it is very hard to get the smell out. Mine has also gets stained easily when I make cold brewed tea. The stains come out if you soak it with vinegar, but then you have to try to get the vinegar smell out. It is also too tall to fit easily in the refrigerator, it would be better if it was slightly shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Kumquat

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, putting back together is a bit cumbersome and it leaks
customer_reviews.text: The basket, top and pitcher all separate for cleaning which I like in theory but the top, middle part is such a hassle. Worse yet it leaks like crazy so I realize it's not sealed for all that trouble. This item might be a great infuser but it's a hassle. The fruit basket area is a nice large size and the plastic does have a nice heavy feel as the item is sturdy but it's just a bit awkward in putting back together and not worth the effort. I've given mine away after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Eve in the darkTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I Have No Idea Why This Pitcher Has Such Positive Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Because it is utter crappity crap crap crap crap. The vacuum is crap. And it is also crap, I think that I forgot to mention that.
customer_reviews.author: Introvertmb

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect, No Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start making alkaline water for myself at home so I purchased this to infuse my normal water with alkali foods. This pitcher works great! There are no leaks when I shake it and it holds a lot of material in the middle. When I pour it goes directly into my cup rather than all over the place or dribbling. I love it and am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy & Dr. Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Leaks Like A Siv
customer_reviews.text: This thing had one job: to not leak when shaken. It failed. I bought two of these to make large portions of protein shakes (whey powder and water) at once. So I put 64 ounces of water and 4 scoops of powder in and start shaking. What happens? Water starts splashing out of the flip top lid. The screw on part of the lid seals well because I can wrench it down insanely tight. But the flip top lid? You can't get it any tighter, and it leaks like a siv.
customer_reviews.author: Viper

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Smart design
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile pitcher thats super safe around kids. Can take this outside for a barbecue and don't have to worry about it breaking. It's a smart design. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Parent

customer_reviews.title: This pitcher is great for making infused water
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is great for making infused water. The best thing is that the basket goes all the way to the bottom. The fruit stays immersed even if the pitcher is 3/4 empty. My water bottles with the infuser only go about 1/4 of the way down. I was afraid it would take up too much room in the fridge, but it doesn't. As far as earlier reviews that said it was difficult to figure out how to get the basket out, now there is a sticker on the top that explains how to open the top. I used it to make cold brew tea, then took the tea bags out and added rasberries.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Young

customer_reviews.title: The spout is very flat, causing it to splash when it pours.
customer_reviews.text: The spout is very flat, causing it to splash when it pours. I've been using it to pour water in sport bottles and it's difficult to hit the opening. This probably works fine for wide glasses, but I've had a hard time getting all the water to hit a 3" wide sports bottle opening. I'm giving this one away and buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Shiclure

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fruit infuser pitcher for a while and i finally found a good designed pitcher. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Mar's

customer_reviews.title: Much more fun and sturdy than expected. Neat product.
customer_reviews.text: Way cooler than I thought it would be. I've loved it for making lightly-flavored fruit water for my bike bottles. Swigging ice cold , subtly-strawberry flavored water on a long ride has been an unexpected treat. I sometimes make it "extra fruity" and really pack the fruit into the container so I can use it to top off a glass of lime seltzer. So many options with this thing. It's sturdy for how inexpensive it was, too. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: reInexpensive and it works!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher may not look as nice as the schmancy one I ordered before it, but it definitely is more functional. Heed the reviews about opening the top to get to the infusing unit. Since the instructions are inside it and it does not operate the way you intuitively think it would, that was a design flaw. Otherwise, this plastic infusion pitcher works as advertised, and you can shake it to mix the solution if need be without fear of spilling. Large enough as well. Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You cannot go wrong with this pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I am a Southern woman that loves her tea, a little too much. Water does not appeal to me. I brought this pitcher to start drinking The taste of the water is great. Since receiving this pitcher, I have not made tea, or thought about making tea. Love this pitcher, lover the infused water I make with this pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Rhon

customer_reviews.title: Great pitcher
customer_reviews.text: After looking at a few different infuse pitchers, I was excited to find this one with a lower price and many great reviews. We sterilized and began using this guy the day it came in and we all love it! Works well. The top screws on so you can shake and carry this around without any worries. I imagine it would make it fine to a picnic or trip to the park as well! I would suggest this pitcher to anyone in the market for an infuser option.
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: Love it!m
customer_reviews.text: I get tired of drinking plain water, but wanted a way to flavor it naturally. Love this pitcher! The infuser tube is wide enough to hold a variety of fruits, and is long enough to "almost" reach the bottom. (Shorter tubes mean the fruit is out of the water after a glass or two is poured) the tube fits tightly, but is easy to remove for cleaning, and the spout makes for easy pouring. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sophiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great infusion pitcher.
customer_reviews.text: Great pitcher can be used for infused or plain water. Good with citrus, berries or any kind of fruit. Certain vegetables too.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: I bought it March/April-ish 2014. It's now 2015. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it March/April-ish 2014. It's now 2015. I use it daily with lemons and/or cucumbers. As long as you change out the fruit/veggies on a regular basis it doesn't have any weird aftertastes. It holds 2 quarts of water and has measurement markers on the side. It makes it easier to measure how much water I drink. I'm suppose to drink a gallon a day, so filling this up twice makes it easier to measure.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Goose

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong...
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher. That being said, it really would be helpful if the directions on how to open this pitcher were not stored inside the core where they cannot be read. I had to go to the Amazon customer reviews and ask a question to figure the thing out. Of course, if you are more mechanically inclined than I am, it might be a snap. I love the concept of this pitcher and have made many different combinations of infused waters in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pitcher and the only reason i have it a 4 star is that i had a heck of a time getting it open the first time as the directions were "inside " the pitcher. after I figured it out no problem. But it has a button on the top to open the latch which is not real apparent when you first see it. Otherwise it is a great product and once you know how to open it no big deal
customer_reviews.author: shells

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Top screws on so he careful when pouring
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jaccard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was difficult to figure out how to use without taking it all apart. Once I figured out the simple mechanisms, I was very happy with how it functions as an infuser. It is well made but has bad illustrations/instructions. For instance, you have to turn the top lid 1/2-way in order to pour a drink. It fits well on the refrigerator door.
customer_reviews.author: S. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Infuser for life.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't stopped using this pither from the day it arrived in my home. I love it I have been Infusing for 5 months now and I've lost close to 10 pounds. I also recommend buying the infused recipe book its fun trying the different flavors and if you really wanted It to work incorporate the Kirkland Japanese green tea you will see results automatically I love it I'm an New infused fan for life. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: CM Bell

customer_reviews.title: lived up to recommendation
customer_reviews.text: helped me with water consumption I like being able to have fruit infused water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain considering the price. Haven't had any problems with leaking. Planning on buying another one
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: This is a great infused water pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the removable basket in the center; it makes cleanup a lot easier, and it helps the infusion process work much better. My strawberry and basil infused water never tasted better!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It was a holiday and thought it would be a wasted call. If it werent for reading the reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to call amazon to find out how to get in touch with the maker of this product. It was a holiday and thought it would be a wasted call. If it werent for reading the reviews I never would have figured out t how to open this product. So for the aggrevation alone i cannot give it a functional rating. I wish the manufacturer would read these comments and take heed.
customer_reviews.author: Rita N.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy alternative to those Nasty artifical sweetened drinks!
customer_reviews.text: Fisrt few times opening fruit tube can be tricky m. but this makes great fruit flavored Healthy drinks. Wasnt fond of using pineapple , but strawberries and raspberries worked great. Next will try watermelon! Pitcher is easy to clean and a Wise Buy! All who have tasted the fruit water love it!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne C.

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to have the 3 quart pitcher
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have the 3 quart pitcher. I cannot understand other people's problem with getting the basket out. In fact I was really embarrassed for them. It took me 2 seconds to see how it works. I thought it was nice to have a handle on the inside of the basket to pull it out. The screw open/close lid is why I don't love it, but hey it works so I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: mooni

customer_reviews.title: I like, but need better directions
customer_reviews.text: So I am liking this pitcher, but why have the instructions INSIDE the container??? Also, who thought to super glue the info on the outside of the pitcher?? Very hard to take off. I need better direction on how to get the top to let me pour. It says "lineup the arrows", but one can hardly see any arrows???? Help!!!
customer_reviews.author: E.C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: This product did not allow as much of the fruit flavor to come across.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Early

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of adding my fruit to the center of a whole pitcher of water instead of making individual cups each time. Saves time, as well as money on fruit!
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Nice size infusion center.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to fill, infuses cucumber especially well. I do like this pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: NHH

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a minute to get used to all the twists & turns, but a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ms N

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Product for a Family's Healthy Lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works great, but it is a lot of water for a one person to drink alone. Was delivered promptly and on time. Would recommend for a more than one member family who uses a lot of infused water.
customer_reviews.author: FGYetner

customer_reviews.title: Good value infuser
customer_reviews.text: This infuser is a good value. I really like that the lid screws closed to prevent leakage. Top also snaps open for access to infuser basket.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gauntlett

customer_reviews.title: Tall pitcher
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher works fine, it’s just tall so it doesn’t fit in my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: iamchrissa

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item. Fruit water is my new thing. I am a person that doesn't drink soda and stays away from sugar as much as possible. I can just put some frozen fruit in the middle part and add water. A few hours later the water taste just like the fruit. It's great. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Works great! In some other reviews they have complained that ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! In some other reviews they have complained that the instructions for how to open the container were inside the container so you couldn't figure out how to open it when it arrived, but the maker seems to have fixed that issue as the top is clearly labeled to instruct you how to open it to retrieve the full instructions. All in all I got exactly what I wanted out of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine and the price
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't actually made anything in it yet, I've read the directions, open and closed it, put water in it and poured it back out through the spout. It works just fine and the price, based on what I've seen while looking for something like this, is pretty good. I experienced no splashing while pouring like a reviewer complained of.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  good price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift, and my mom loves it! It fits well in our fridge, flavors the water well, and the lid makes a good seal for shaking it. This is a great buy for the price, and as long as it holds up with time I will be very happy
customer_reviews.author: t.marrow

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pitcher for several weeks. I am happy with it and there are no problems. Read the other reviews about how to open the lid and the infuser section. That will be helpful because the instructions are packaged inside of the pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Sis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean, great design.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use, easy to clean and fits nicely in the fridge. Super easy to pour in the fruit. Sturdy yet flexible plastic, feels like it will take a licking and keep on ticking. Good design for handling and pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ballance

customer_reviews.title: Summer at it' s best.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter calls it BerryWater. Absolutely terrific. Use fresh or frozen fruits. Most useful product I've bought this season. Great way to get all the fluids you need for the hot summer
customer_reviews.author: The GREAT NANA

customer_reviews.title: Fushion Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Durable ✔️. As described✔️. Easy to use ✔️. Truly leak proof ✔️. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: DSR_7767

customer_reviews.title: The opinion is unanimous among my friends - we al love this pitcher and use it constantly
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for me and then over the few months bought 7 or8 more for gifts. The opinion is unanimous among my friends - we al love this pitcher and use it constantly. Easy to clean. If you have a large family - get two - you will thank me.
customer_reviews.author: AZDebra

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have made starbucks shaken iced tea lemonade, fruit infused water....next up sangria! It doesn't fit in the door of the fridge but that's not a deal breaker for me. It's durable as well. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: ERI P

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as an infuser, tea maker, all around great product. Perfect size for a packed fridge as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have a water bottle infuser that I really like but I ordered this so it could have a chance to sit before I drink it. I love this! I made a batch of lemon and strawberry water in this pitcher and it's great :)
customer_reviews.author: RENEE

customer_reviews.title: Great infuser pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic pitcher! It is durable and a nice design. It's made of sturdy plastic, so if it's dropped it will not break. I put cucumbers and melon as my first trial experiment and I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I bought this pitcher mainly for travelling with drinks. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pitcher mainly for travelling with drinks. This one fit all my needs. I will be ordering the separate chiller core very soon.
customer_reviews.author: VolDuq

customer_reviews.title: You will LOVE this pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pitcher! So much better than having fruit floating willy nilly. Large yet still fits nicely I the fridge. Well made and easy to clean! Very pleased with this purchase and will be buying more from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fancy flavored water for next to nothing!
customer_reviews.text: Mint is our favorite, but fresh basil and lime, rosemary and lemon, and seasonal berries are good as well. thanks to the reviewers who explained the tricks on opening and filling this pitcher. great product, easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: NH Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: Infused water is all the rage right now. There is nothing wrong with this pitcher but it didn't blow mw away either. The lid can be tricky if you don't read the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Pinupgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who love good water.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made all year. I love my infused water. I have made so many pitchers and all of them have turned out deliscous. It has really increased my water intake as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Combs

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Infuser
customer_reviews.text: I do love this pitcher. I've had it for months now and holds up really well. I've infused so many things with it. I've made Ice Tea during the summer and put lemons in the infuser. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: awesome pitcher
customer_reviews.text: awesome pitcher. Love the suggestions that came with the pitcher. Its easy to take the fruit out with the little portal and fuser handle.

customer_reviews.title: I like the product because it's just normal plastic
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because it's just normal plastic, I've tried other kinds, and they always break this one here, works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sillas

customer_reviews.title: Love This Pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this pitcher so much that I ordered another one for my daughter-in-law. I love making mint iced tea or infusing fresh lemons in my water using this 3 qt. pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: L Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product but I don't use it as an infuser as much as I thought I would. If you do infuse, you will love it because it's easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy my pitcher helped my to cut down on sodas ...
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy my pitcher helped my to cut down on sodas and drink more water. Cheaper then buying flavored and it's natural.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for this pitcher! I can shake it without any problems. Exactly what I was looking for, so glad I ignored the bad reviews!

customer_reviews.title: All promises kept.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Easy to use. Fits in fridge door, as promised; easy to clean, as promised; well-constructed, as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher works great. You put all the things you want to infuse in the middle and give it some time to infuse. Easy to open and close.

customer_reviews.title: I love that it doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: I love that it doesn't leak. I've made all kinds of flavored waters, lemonades, and iced teas. The directions for getting to the insert were inside the insert, so that was a little tricky to figure out. But, once that was done, I had no problems.

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but decent quality. i like the lid design and the ability to remove the filter basket. Love love love lemon mint water without having to dodge the leafy bits

customer_reviews.text: Very nice pitcher, good seal to keep the water in. Plastic is very good quality. I got a hand held version to make smaller mixed drinks that I like as well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Love this - fruit infused water is so much healthier than the artificially sweetened bottled waters! This is perfect and just what we expected it to be!

product_meta.title: Primula Today Shake and Infuse Pitcher – Spacious and Innovative Infusion Chamber – 100% BPA, PVC, Phthalate, and Lead Free – 3 Quarts – Yellow
product_meta.description: Color:YellowPicture this: You’re relaxing on a warm summer day at the beach. The sun is shining, reflecting off the clinking ice in your glass. In that glass is a delicious and refreshing drink that quenches your thirst. The Primula Today Shake and Infuse Pitcher makes that imagination a reality. With an innovative design that allows for a huge range of creative and tasty concoctions as well as a spacious infusion chamber and easy access flip-top, you’ll be making awesome drinks in no time. Use any combination of sweet and health-conscious fruits to make satisfying, low calorie drinks in our completely safe and efficient Today Shake and Infuse Pitcher.
feature_bullets: QUALITY, INNOVATIVE BUILD: The Primula Today Shake and Infuse Pitcher features an innovative design that allows for a huge range of creative and tasty concoctions. With an easy access flip-top lid and a spacious infusion chamber designed to hold all kinds of ingredients and prevent messes, you’ll be making awesome drinks in no time!

HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS: Tired of family members and friends drinking soda and other sugary beverages that are sure to destroy diets? Our Today Shake and Infuse Pitcher allows you to make drinks that are not only delicious, but healthy too. Use any combination of sweet and health-conscious fruits to make satisfying, low calorie drinks!

NO HASSLE STORAGE: With a minimal physical footprint, the Today Shake and Infuse Pitcher can easily be stored away in a refrigerator or freezer for later use and enjoyment. It also fits in almost all refrigerator doors.

SAFE, EASY CLEAN: The Primula Today Shake and Infuse Pitcher is 100% free of BPA, PVC, phthalates, lead, and other metals, and features safe, temperate glass. Plus, it’s entirely dishwasher safe, making cleaning hassle free.
SPECIFICATIONS: Package includes (1) 3 qt. Primula Today Shake and Infuse Pitcher in Yellow.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
